resources.string: Now you can click on the tray icon to enable power saving. Your screen will turn off while your phone is facing a surface, like flipped on a table or inside your pocket. Whenever you see your screen it will be back on. Cheers!
To save battery, the screen will turn off while your phone is facing a surface, like flipped on a table or inside your pocket. When you see your screen again it will turn back on. Cheers!
We can\'t do it without your permission

Lights Out will help save your battery by turning your screen off, wile keepig your phone unlocked. While the app is active flip your phone on a surface or keep it in your pocket and your screen will turn off. Your apps or services will keep running. \nThe app can be accessed through quick settings in your notification tray.

Lights Out works with the proximity sensor of your phone. Once activated anything blocking the sensor will cause the sceen to black out. When your screen isn\'t facing a surface the screen will be back on again.
How to drag your quick settings.
How to edit your quick settings.
